verses.verse: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man עֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> stand עַל־ <WH5921> on רַגְלֶ֔יךָ <WH7272> upon thy feet וַאֲדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> and I will speak אֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH853>

וַתָּ֧בֹא <WH935> entered בִ֣י ר֗וּחַ <WH7307> And the spirit כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> into me when he spake אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about וַתַּעֲמִדֵ֖נִי <WH5975> unto me and set עַל־ <WH5921> on רַגְלָ֑י <WH7272> me upon my feet וָאֶשְׁמַ֕ע <WH8085> that I heard אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> him that spake אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man שׁוֹלֵ֨חַ <WH7971> I send אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I אֽוֹתְךָ֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> thee to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> about גּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> nation הַמּוֹרְדִ֖ים <WH4775> to a rebellious אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who מָרְדוּ־ <WH4775> that hath rebelled בִ֑י הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> they וַאֲבוֹתָם֙ <WH1> against me they and their fathers פָּ֣שְׁעוּ <WH6586> have transgressed בִ֔י עַד־ <WH5704> against עֶ֖צֶם <WH6106> against me [even] unto this very הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וְהַבָּנִ֗ים <WH1121> children קְשֵׁ֤י <WH7186> churlish פָנִים֙ <WH6440> accept וְחִזְקֵי־ <WH2389> harder לֵ֔ב <WH3820> care for אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I am שׁוֹלֵ֥חַ <WH7971> I do send אוֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> and וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> thee unto them and thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> them אִם־ <WH518> whether יִשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> And they whether they will hear וְאִם־ <WH518> or יֶחְדָּ֔לוּ <WH2308> or whether they will forbear כִּ֛י <WH3588> for בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house מְרִ֖י <WH4805> (for they [are] a rebellious הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> like וְיָ֣דְע֔וּ <WH3045> acknowledge כִּ֥י <WH3588> that נָבִ֖יא <WH5030> that there hath been a prophet הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> has been בְתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> among פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you בֶן־ <WH1121> And thou son אָ֠דָם <WH120> of man אַל־ <WH408> neither תִּירָ֨א <WH3372> be not afraid מֵהֶ֜ם <WH1992> like וּמִדִּבְרֵיהֶ֣ם <WH1697> of their words אַל־ <WH408> nor תִּירָ֗א <WH3372> of them neither be afraid כִּ֣י <WH3588> though סָרָבִ֤ים <WH5621> though briers וְסַלּוֹנִים֙ <WH5544> and thorns אוֹתָ֔ךְ <WH854> for וְאֶל־ <WH413> on עַקְרַבִּ֖ים <WH6137> among scorpions אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you יוֹשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> [be] with thee and thou dost dwell מִדִּבְרֵיהֶ֤ם <WH1697> of their words אַל־ <WH408> neither תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> be not afraid וּמִפְּנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6440> at their looks אַל־ <WH408> nor תֵּחָ֔ת <WH2865> nor be dismayed כִּ֛י <WH3588> though בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house מְרִ֖י <WH4805> though they [be] a rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> you

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֤ <WH1696> And thou shalt speak אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרַי֙ <WH1697> my words אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to אִֽם־ <WH518> whether יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> unto them whether they will hear וְאִם־ <WH518> or יֶחְדָּ֑לוּ <WH2308> or whether they will forbear כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מְרִ֖י <WH4805> for they [are] most rebellious הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> now you בֶן־ <WH1121> But thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man שְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> hear אֵ֤ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to what אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I am מְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> what I say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּהִי־ <WH1961> unto thee Be not מֶ֖רִי <WH4805> thou rebellious כְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑רִי <WH4805> like that rebellious פְּצֵ֣ה <WH6475> open פִ֔יךָ <WH6310> thy mouth וֶאֱכֹ֕ל <WH398> and eat אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> that I give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> then

וָאֶרְאֶ֕ה <WH7200> And when I looked וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold יָ֖ד <WH3027> behold an hand שְׁלוּחָ֣ה <WH7971> [was] sent אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> lo ב֖וֹ מְגִלַּת־ <WH4039> unto me and lo a roll סֵֽפֶר׃ <WH5612> of a book

וַיִּפְרֹ֤שׂ <WH6566> And he spread אוֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> לְפָנַ֔י <WH6440> it before וְהִ֥יא <WH1931> it was כְתוּבָ֖ה <WH3789> me and it [was] written פָּנִ֣ים <WH6440> within וְאָח֑וֹר <WH268> and without וְכָת֣וּב <WH3789> and [there was] written אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> on קִנִ֥ים <WH7015> therein lamentations וָהֶ֖גֶה <WH1899> and mourning וָהִֽי׃ <WH1958> and woe ס
